title: Better for buyers, not sellers
reviewText: VERY EASY app to use. Was up and running without a hitch. This app is great for buyers. Lots to choose from since it's a very popular destination. I prefer it over EBay as a buyer. As a seller, not so much. I've had great sales, friendly reviewers and have enjoyed fulfilling my sales orders. However beware if there is the slightest issue. The buyer is in complete control, customer service does not get each side of the story. Customer service is a robotic response with a "case closed" sorry for your luck type of mentality. Let's get real, all buys and all sells are subjective to one's point of view. Not everyone thinks alike. I had an unhappy buyer. Instead of the buyer asking for that guaranteed return/refund they kept the item and slammed me in a review. Why keep me from offering a refund Mercari? Not my fault the buyer kept the product, they didn't have to at all. Dislikes: Way too many notifications of items that I "might like"                Can't display in landscape mode on my tabletLikes: You get to see what others sold their items for           Quick deposit of funds to your own bank           Extremely easy to navigate            Awesome pre-paid shipping rates, I know because I manage a                    shipping store that uses FedEx, USPS and UPS.

title: App has been super laggy lately
reviewText: I do not like the new version of the app, it makes it harder to navigate to my profile which was an easy tap before in the bottom right corner where my hand conveniently rested. It was also easy to get to messages and likes while in my profile which as a seller I am constantly navigated around the app to to check on sales and my listings. It is in an inconvenient location now in the upper left hand corner (?) and does not help with the user interface. Please switch it back. This is just feedback and I would really like it to be passed on to the app development team.I have over 200 5🤩 ratings from buying and selling, but I have sold over a hundred items. The problem I have is that ghost buyers buy my items and never rate me when they receive the item, dont respond to my messages or even have anything for sale or are brand new users. The only reason this bothers me is because Mercari does not make an effort to prevent this from happening to sellers. They should have a "You list/sell an item, then you can start buying items" or make sure they are a real person via facebook or email confirmation or something.. Even make it so that you can't buy an item unless at least one conversation is made between the buyer and seller. Recently, the past week or so, the app for me will not load. I dont know why. Its super lagging the part of the time, but mostly it doesn't load, for example when I click on an item, the pics dont load, the info doesnt load, nothing comes up except the name of the listing, I can't even search for anything or look at my own listings, this is a huge bummer for me.I have an iPhone 7 with IOS 11.2.5. And have deleted and reinstalled the app, restarted my phone, etc. I need Mercari to see this is a problem for me, and may even be affecting other users.To improve the app, include a way to either a. Post more pics on the actual listing, or b. Send them directly to whoever asks via message. Also make it an option for sellers to accept offers or not and include cheaper media mail options for items in book and CD categories. Also include a way to ship items not using a Mercari label and be able to charge the buyer separately for shipping since sometimes it costs less to actually ship than the standard Mercari label prices.Also including a way to list quantities of the same item and not have the post unusable after. Like if I am selling two of the same item, one listing for both that says two are available and allows the buyer to buy one or both at the same time by pressing the quantity, the shipping is then confirmed later by the seller as to what weight category it fall into. This would be great for bundling too as well as have a cart to buy multiple items at the same time instead of going from listing to listing.And just as a suggestion, another great way to spread the Mercari brand would be to send Mercari labels to sellers to put on their boxes/packages, I think it would be cute, kinda like what amazon and eBay do already.

title: Where is the Customer Service?
reviewText: I've been a seller since last year and have had a few run ins with transactions that really got me thinking. The help center does not particularly help me with my technical issues and I really want to speak to real people in order to identify what is going on with my account! A lot of errors everywhere, instant pay does not work, and I am left to my own devices to try and satisfy my buyers outside of Mercari grounds in order to ensure my merchandise is received, which is obviously "against conduct policy" but what can I do when hundreds of dollars worth of items get potentially lost/stolen?! The contact number online is a bust, the chat button does not exist. I can't get in touch with the company at all! Do I really have to fish for an email in the internet to see if I get a reply within the next five days when I need an answer now? Why is it so difficult to get in touch with Mercari? What am I missing?

title: Good place to sell
reviewText: Mercari is a useful app to sell either new or used items that need a new home. They do have a lower selling fee than Poshmark which is a plus, but I feel that the users on this app want things for a very low price. That can be frustrating especially if you're selling nice items in great condition. The other thing that bothers me is that there's a $2 fee to direct deposit if it's under $10, which I feel defeats the purpose. So if you've sold something for a low price you have to wait until you sell something else or use that credit to buy something. (Poshmark doesn't have this fee.) Overall, I have to give the app credit because I've been able to make some money off of clothes and other items I don't have use for anymore, so I thank them for that. Shoutout Mercari!

title: Needs new features
reviewText: Mercari is a great app to sell on with the exception of occasional lack of protection for sellers. They are in serious need of updates to the platform though - you should be able to promote much more than 10 times a day and there should be a feature like Poshmark that allows you to bundle products from the same seller. It's difficult when a buyer wants about 10 items from you and you can't just do a bundle gig, you have to literally upload a photo of all 10 items together and then tell them it's ready, blah blah blah. If those two features were fixed, this would be the perfect selling platform.

title: The dispute Escalation Team is awful!
reviewText: I sold my item and shipped it with labels provided by Mercari. And the buyer filed a return request because "he received a different item according to him", before even contacting the seller! And of course Mercari approved the request without even questioning with the seller! I was SO disappointed at this point because not only did I receive any payment or my item back, but because I don't deserve being shown any proof of return approval. The escalation team staff just replied perfunctorily how incapable they are in this situation, and ended my conversation by claiming the case was "resolved"! ------------------The sellers are so unprotected in this app. I understand dispute could happen in Mercari's business paradigm, as no third-party in the middle can verify the transaction. And when something like this happened, they always treat sellers like trash! So what I learned is, if you want to sell your unused cheapie, do it on Mercari. DON'T SELL ANY VALUABLES.

title: Great App But Frustrating
reviewText: I have been on mercari since they were in beta, a lot of things have improved but a couple things I have a gripe with are shipping and contacting them. I had an issue with a buyer giving me a poor review for no remote reason, and when checking their FAQ's and their "contact us" page, they didn't help. The descriptions on what to do contradicted each other. Also, they never directly give you an email or number to call on the app. I had to do a search on the internet to find it but I ultimately decided to message them on Twitter because they seemed active on that page. My second issue is shipping. Whenever I edit an item mercari instantly changes it to "free shipping". Sometimes I don't catch it, and people buy my items but I only get a $2 profit because of the free shipping. It's very frustrating because I get excited over getting a purchase but realize I only made $2 on a pair of shoes.

reviewText: Awesome app for selling. Some amazing traits that other selling apps don't have. However, what every single other selling platform does have is ORIGINALITY and ORGANIZATION/REORGANIZATION. Personally, not being able to reorganize and share items like you can do on other apps is a deal breaker. It's not aesthetically pleasing.You also aren't able to make up your own URL? Which is confusing to me because a brand name is essential for shop owners. Good, secure platform. Payment system is awesome, accepts all kinds of payments and is secure money wise. They will never be up to par with other selling apps if they don't fix those 2 fatal flaws in my opinion, even though they have the making to take others down completely.

title: Buyer Protection Guarantee works!
reviewText: I was a little hesitant at first to purchase a used $100 kitchen appliance, but since Mercari had a Buyer Protection Guarantee, I felt that if there was a problem, I would be taken care of and I was!  I received the Juicer and tested it out as soon as it came and unfortunately, it didn't work. I took pictures and documented all the information of my purchase and emailed customer support. I received an email within 6 hours from customer support requesting more information which I sent. Each time I sent an email, I received a response soon after.  Once the return was approved, the shipping Dept sent a shipping label to cover the return shipping cost! title: Love the app but...
reviewText: I have had a lot of success selling my things through this app. Their seller's fee is competitive and definitely the main reason I came to this platform in the first place. A general consensus I've heard is that we need to be able to search our own listings. While I feel this would be a useful feature, for me my biggest problem is not being able to share or re-list things without fully deleting and posting a new listing. Things easily get pushed back as they get older and new listings are posted and my items get lost in a black hole it feels. When people do actually find my item my inbox is flooded with "is this still available" because it's been listed for months and I've had no way to repost it or do anything to show it is in any way still active. It's really unfair we should need to lower our price and then one of the "benefits" of lowering our price is advertised that they will bump our listing back up to the beginning of search. We should be able to refresh our items without that being the case. Even if it was once every 2 weeks we were able to re-list each posting I believe it would save everyone a lot of time and would keep buyers aware on what is current. Many times I have passed up buying something merely bc it says it was a 6 months old posting and I cba to message the seller. In addition, if a seller includes free shipping, mercari should not be making a profit on that. Shipping is one thing and the item is another. I was under the impression the shipping price was solely to cover the cost of shipping not that mercari got 10% on that too. They encourage you to include free shipping as it "makes the time 2x more likely to sell" but then they also take 10% of that. Really disappointing.

title: Deactivating listings for no reason?
reviewText: Got a notification today saying that a few of my "old" listings were being deactivated because they were "inactive" and that I should take a moment to review them so that I don't miss out on sales. They send me a list of 20+ listings that THEY deactivated on my behalf, without my permission. One in particular that I posted only a month ago was deactivated, yet older listings beyond that one were still kept active! Also a listing was deactivated that had been recently getting likes, and I even promoted it to likers just this morning (before Mercari decided to deactivate it). This could've potentially made me miss out on a sale, had I not reactivated it after seeing this stupid notification. So I'd like to know how that listing could possibly be considered "inactive" when it's getting likes and being promoted? If this is going to be continuously happening with my listings, then I may just not use this app to sell anymore.If you can tell that I am ACTIVELY using the app, my listings are getting likes, and I'm obviously keeping track of my own stuff... then LET ME MAINTAIN MY LISTINGS ON MY OWN. This isn't my first rodeo, I can handle it without your intervention.Oh and I tried reaching out to customer service before leaving a review but after going through the different tiers to "contact us" I eventually landed on a "Sorry, page not found" error. You should probably fix that.

title: Counterfeit items
reviewText: I have been selling on this app for a couple years now. I sell fragrances. Legit ones. There are a lot of people selling counterfeit fragrances. I report the ones I spot but nothing happens. Some unsuspecting person buys the counterfeit one and don't know because they have never smelled the fragrance. It makes it harder for me selling the real fragrances because the fakes are cheaper and mine gets passed up because it's more expensive. If I report a counterfeit it should be taken down.

title: Trending love!
reviewText: I love this site for many reasons... It's easy to sell items. You can message sellers and buyers about items(messaging about items is soooo handy.). You can upload plenty of photos(thanks for that update!) There's suggestions of similar items. If you see an item you want, you can easily like it and receive exclusive offers. Making offers on items is super easy. Maybe you found something you like but it isn't your size, you can click the brand and look for similar items. Following people is easy. Inactive items get deleted, so if someone no longer uses Merc, no worries. Everyone loves that we are protected through the buyer protection guarantee. Easy to see people's ratings. You can save searches and even get notifications when people post items you're looking for! Mercari takes out 20%, while other sites are taking nearly all my earnings and I'm left with a dollar or two. I do wish they had the feature to share items; and I wish they had some sort of event to share items of a certain brand, style, etc.(Whether you're a buyer, seller, or fan of a brand! Share the amazing items, at amazing prices *to the events*, so they get sold!). Gaining followers can be a little tough(goes along with sharing items). I'd be interested in seeing a comment option on items. And I wish it were a littleee easier to "add to cart" from people when shopping their page, or create bundles with people, and if there were a bundle discount. With every site, it's hard to weave out the bad people and less dedicated people. But hopefully some software or something comes along the way! I have hope! Mercari is the way to go!

title: Do better!
reviewText: For sellers this app is horrible. You get fines for everything! And for buyers and scammers it's the best app. you can literally buy something and then return it without a problem. Even if there's nothing with the item, mercari does not even contact the seller first. they just automatically authorize a refund and you're stuck with having to wait for that person to send you the item back and then have to repost it. I thought this app was going to be better than eBay but it's worse.

title: Beware of scams and fraudulent sellers!
reviewText: I have been using Mercari to buy and sell items for about 10 months now. Most of the transactions are positive and I have enjoyed the experience overall and most of the people who use the app are very kind and honest, however, there are quite a few scammers. I have been scammed three times by people selling fake jewelry items as real. I make and sell jewelry and it's usually cheaper to buy supplies and scrap silver on apps like Mercari, but they do NOTHING about scammers. They either go ahead and pay the seller and refund the buyer, or simply remove a review that had already been left. The sellers continue to sell fake stuff!! I was shocked by the responses I received from customer service. There are LITERALLY no consequence for scammers. There was a incident where a woman suspected her neighbors of stealing the jewelry I sent her as the package was empty when she opened it, and she was very nice about the entire thing. I reported the incident to Mercari, offering a full refund to the buyer, and instead they paid us both and sent me a nasty message telling me to package my items better. I have been consistently rated very high on packaging and everything was as secure as reasonably possible. I was disgusted by how I was treated. I'm going to shut down my Mercari store and start selling on EBay.

title: Was sold damaged goods and refused a refund
reviewText: Where to start. I bought a stroller on this website, after a really long waiting period for it to be sent out the seller messages me to ask how to print a label and where to send it and when she can get her money. I helped as much as I could. Days later I received my package wrapped in brown packing paper. I opened it the box is badly damaged, I mean clearly this box has been put through the ringer. It has Multiple holes, tears  and crush points. Clearly this box had been damaged before wrapping it because the paper wasn't damaged at all. So she knew what she was sending me. I opened the box and the stroller had multiple broken pieces which was vital to the support system of the stroller. Meaning I can't open the stroller and have it lock in place to support my child. I logged onto the app to see about how to return it. The app prompted me to review the seller before I could go any farther. But nobody tells you that once you review the seller it completes and accepts the item. I contacted customer service and they said the same thing. Once you review them it completes the sale. I wrote a very upset email. Customer service says maybe they can allow a one time exception and to provide photos. I provided photos 6 times. Let me repeat that. 6 TIMES. Every time I received an email I responded right away and attached the photos. They kept saying they never got my photos and tried to say the request was closed so I emailed back with the same pictures I kept sending. FINALLY someone says ok I received the images but I need more of the item farther away. And I have 24 hours to provide them. I get up at 5:30 am and work 12 hour shifts at a hospital delivering babies. I received the email about 2 am. I read it on my way to work. By the time I got home from my 12 hour shift I had not provided the images in time. GOD FORBID ANYONE HAVE A LIFE TO DEAL WITH. Or children to look after. Or things to do like adult responsibilities. So now my case is closed because i didn't comply with their ridiculous demands for extra photos of things I already sent them. And this lady gets away with  selling damaged goods and I'm just supposed to eat the money I spent I stroller. I looked for 7 months at this stroller before biting the bullet, and buying it. I didn't have extra money to lose this month. Just To be slapped in the face with a broken item and no way to rectify it. This is a scam company and your better off buying things from the original store or Facebook market. DONT SHOP HERE. ITS NOT WORTH IT.

title: Some sellers try to con you
reviewText: One of the unfortunate things about this app is that if you return an item you can't leave a seller review and if you leave a review all sales are final. There are also sellers who write in their description that they will block you if they see you've left negative feedback on someone else. So if you purchase something that is advertised as 18k gold and you receive a piece of junk they bought off Wish your options are 1) return the item and get your money back, minus shipping and your cost to ship the return, then you let someone else fall victim to the a-hole. Or 2) Warm other people about the sellers scam but then you're out of your money completely and other sellers may block you. I've looked and I can't find a way to report a seller for deliberately misleading buyers. Legitimate sellers are great and I've found a lot of great stuff but this is something that needs corrected. Currently trying to decide during my three day time limit to rate and let other people know a seller is a scam artist or return this ten cent piece of junk I bought. 🤔

title: Far Superior to Poshmark
reviewText: After deleting my Poshmark closet/account more than a year ago, I've slowly switched over to Mercari to sell my remaining inventory. In comparison to Poshmark, Mercari is a far superior platform. Some of the reasons for this are: keeping more of my earnings from sales, it being far less time consuming (no sharing; platform does not require its users to be the "engine"/free labor to function), and that they somehow manage to keep their platform free of all of the vulgar/unpleasant/disgusting listings like I was constantly exposed to on Poshmark.It is a far more professionally operated platform in every way.

title: Sellers Beware
reviewText: I've been using this app (and others) for several years. However, when I had a shipping issue (USPS didn't track and seller canceled order before tracking began even though reporting that I shipped) which  VOIDED the tracking number. You can imagine the headache this has caused me working with USPS. And also Mercari who very honestly speaking here, couldn't be less helpful...despite the $200 shipping insurance they claim to have with their shipping labels. Luckily, $20 is a small price to pay to learn this company does not care about their customers. I've taken all my items down and stopped purchasing as to me, this is not a trustworthy company to work with. Sell at your own risk.

title: Great Shopping, Great Selections, Great Customer Service
reviewText: I joined Mercari several months ago and have done some buying and selling. I have only good things to say. Even when a seller didn't respond to a purchase I made on his site, Mercari backed up its guarantee. That's why this a great way to shop, if you like doing shopping online! You can do it without the worry of the what if, because you know Mercari has a guarantee and your money is protected if a seller backs out or if the product is what it was described as or if your unhappy with it in some way. The items I've bought have all been exactly what was advertised, I look for sellers who have good reviews. Another great feature Mercari offers, so that you can feel rest assured with what your getting. Other sellers I've bought from have made up for the one who didn't respond. All very nice, people take pride in their reviews so its motivation to shop quickly in the 3 business days Mercari allows. And to package nicely ...Mercari set great standards to achieve. I feel they have thought of most everything. As a seller, they make that easy and provide the shipping labels and clear instructions to help get the best review for yourself as a seller and a happy buyer! They take a fair percentage for the sale. They also have a great team to answer clearly any questions I've had about how to use the site. The site is easy to use. So much you can find on here! Glad I found it. Happy Customer here!!

title: Don’t sell on this app
reviewText: I used this app for 3 years as a seller and buyer with no problem. Recently I had the worst experience ever :( which is ending my time on Mercari! I sold a under armour cup that was lost in shipment (I used a Mercari shipping label). Mercari refunds the buyer but not me (not fair) I reach out to them that the item was lost and that is not my fault. Please keep in mind that they usually refund your cars or give you points to use within their app I would have been fine with either honestly. But no! Mercari makes me go through the carrier to try to get my package back or a refund. I can get neither bc I was not aware that I had to purchase insurance for a package I though mercari took care of their buyer and sellers but no not anymore. Beware if you want to sell on this app Mercari won't protect you.

title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE
reviewText: This was my first time ever selling on Mercari. I usually sell my items on apps such as Tradesy and Poshmark. Well I made the biggest mistake by selling my Saint Laurent bag on here and not my usual apps. I sold my bag to a young lady who seemed nice. Shipped it right away and she received it 2 days later. She then requested a return which was fine, but I was curious as to why so I messaged her asking why because I had sent her countless pictures and we had been messaging back and fourth for a while before I shipped it out. She never responds. I had a trip to Oakland planned for the weekend and left the day the bag was supposed to be returned. Therefore, I was not able to open the bag until I returned from my trip. Well, when I returned from my trip and opened my returned item days later. It was COMPLETELY destroyed. It looked like the young girl had purposely destroyed my bag so she could return it and get a refund (idk maybe something came up and she really needed the money, it was NOT a cheap bag) but for someone to destroy someone else item is unnecessary. Anyways, I immediately contact the Mercari support. After days of waiting someone responded and told me someone else would be in touch with me. After THREE more days of waiting someone finally responds after I reach out again and say there's nothing they can do because they can only help within the first 24 hours it is delivered and I had past that time. Well i had passed that time because I was out of town and couldn't control what day my item got returned back to me!!! What am I supposed to do cancel my trip in order to ensure someone didn't damage my item before returning it. Anyways, the guy offered me a FIVE dollar coupon to use in the app. Umm NO THANKS. I just lost 500$ and there's nothing your horrible customer service can do about it? I will NOT be using this app again and will make sure my story gets heard and this doesn't happen to anyone else. FIRST and LAST time using this app. Disappointed is an understatement.

title: Unpleasant first experience
reviewText: Will never be using this app again. Mercari's shipping label is absurd. They suggest to use the shipping label but their rates are above the actual price. I had to ship something Priority Mail; USPS price was around $7.00 but Mercari was listing it over $10 dollars. That is above listed price. When I decided to ship it on my own, they deducted the shipping price from my sold item price. When I disputed about this, they decided to refund me, but with Mercari credits. It is an option that I didn't authorized. I wanted the shipping price refunded to my bank account. But they said there is no alternative. title: Watch out.
reviewText: I enjoy this app but it definitely has some negative things along with it. I sent my code to my boyfriend, my grandpa, and my sister. My grandpa isn't technically smart so he had me help him create his account. Later on he deleted the app because he found it kinda shady. He asked me to go on and see when his order would be here so he could close out his account completely. So I did so. With the struggle of it bringing me back to my own account. THEN my boyfriend was at work (I can give legit prove) and he asked me to log in and negotiate with a lady that was trying to purchase his laptop.  Now I get a message today saying they've notice I'm abusing it? Really? Because I logged into my FAMILY MEMBERS ACCOUNT. which I have prove of. It's just irritating that if I do that again it could potentially shut down my account. Not to mention my best friend purchased something off of there and never got it or a refund. She said many other people in the reviews had the same thing happening to them. So tell me about fraud when I have legit people who actually made the accounts, but they can end up screwing people out of their money? Just a heads up for anybody that might be in the same situations. Make sure and message your seller and confirm when they're able to send your items out. And don't log into your friends or family members accounts if they need you too because then you'll be accused of fraud(:

title: Sellers Beware
reviewText: Mercari does not offer sufficient protection for the sellers. There is no option of return or assistance with buyers after a rating. Twice now I have had issues with low ratings because the buyer expected something that was not advertised in the description. For example, the listing stated the item was used, pictures showed used item, and the description stated item was used. The buyer left a low rating, stating they expected a new item. I reached out to Mercari and I was told nothing can be done to help unless the buyer reaches out. It puts sellers livelihoods at risk. It would be a better platform if there was at least an option to respond to our ratings and show what items they were for.

title: Sharp-design, great function for sellers
reviewText: This app is well made, in that it's easy to navigate. Whereas eBay and other competitors, their apps are clunky to me.Mercari is very transparent on what fees they charge you and nothing is hidden! I used to sell on eBay much more, but i was finding all these random fees (insertion, revision, auto-relist, and even more) Mercari has this awesome feature where as a seller you can make offers to people who have liked your item. It is a easy, smart way to help both the buyer and seller alike.Mercari also won't throw your listings into no man's land. On other apps, they make you pay to bump your post, and even then its still on pages 5 or 6. But I feel supported as a seller and a buyer. And importantly, I've found the community to be extremely kind. You get some intense low-ball offers sometimes. But never have I had anyone make outrageous claims about an item they got, or be rude. And most members send you "thank you's" after. Really nice people in general. Also, kinda like Uber, please rate people 5-stars if they did good! I know it hurts sellers reps if you give 3 or 4-stars when they did a fine job. Same goes for your buyers. Rate responsibly! Overall, i love the app. Will continue to use, and honestly i truly hope they don't change their model - bc it works great and i feel supported very well  :)
bodySentimentExplain: 'This [proper noun] app is well made ,in that it's easy to navigate .[sentence: 1,-1] Whereas eBay and other competitors ,their apps are clunky to me .[sentence: 1,-1] Mercari is very transparent on what fees they charge[-2] you and nothing is hidden ![-1 punctuation emphasis] [sentence: 1,-3] I used to sell on eBay much more ,but i was finding all these random fees (insertion ,revision ,auto -relist ,and even more )Mercari [proper noun] has this awesome[4] feature where as a seller you can make offers to people who have liked[3] your item .[sentence: 4,-1] It is a easy ,smart[2] way to help both the buyer and seller alike .[sentence: 2,-1] Mercari also won't throw your listings into no man's land .[sentence: 1,-1] On other apps ,they make you pay to bump your post ,and even then its still on pages 5 or 6 .[sentence: 1,-1] But I feel supported[2] as a seller and a buyer .[sentence: 2,-1] And importantly ,I've found the community to be extremely kind[2] .[sentence: 2,-1] You get some intense low[-2] -ball offers sometimes .[sentence: 1,-2] But never have I had anyone make outrageous[-3] claims about an item they got ,or be rude[-3] .[sentence: 1,-3] And most members send you ''thank[2] you's ''after .[sentence: 2,-1] Really nice[3] people in general .[sentence: 3,-1] Also ,kinda like[2] Uber [proper noun] ,please[3] rate people 5 -stars if they did good[3] ![+1 punctuation emphasis] [sentence: 4,-1] I know it hurts[-3] sellers reps if you give 3 or 4 -stars when they did a fine[3] job .[sentence: 3,-3] Same goes for your buyers .[sentence: 1,-1] Rate responsibly ![+1 punctuation mood emphasis] [sentence: 2,-1] Overall ,i love[3] the app .[sentence: 3,-1] Will continue to use ,and honestly i truly[2] hope[3] they don't change their model -bc it works great[3] and i feel supported[2] very well :)'[sentence: 3,-1] [result = average (38 and -26) of 19 sentences][overall result = 1 as pos>-neg]

title: I wish I could give zero stars
reviewText: I signed up for this app and was very excited. I made a purchase immediately for a Bose charging case. After a day or two I tried to log back into the app to see if my item had been sent and get a tracking number. It went let me login and said my password was incorrect. I tried three or four times a day for over two weeks to try and get it to send me an email so I could change my password and now email ever showed up per what the app said to do if you could not login. For the last several days I have trying to contact them directly but every time I call I am on hold so long it disconnects me and tells me that my call time is too long and to try back again. Now it's just a few short days till Christmas and I find out that the item I ordered on December 4 was never shipped. When I called I asked why if their policy is to ensure that the sender send the item within three days why that wasn't done. They said I had to call them and request that they contact the seller or refund my money. Again I will stress I called for the last several days but was on hold so long they disconnected me until today. I still have no idea how to log into my account they did refund my money finally they did not apologize or give me any explanations and now I have no Christmas present to give that I counted on because I ordered it so early in December. title: Ripped off and No support from site administrators
reviewText: I took a chance and bought a lot of three items from this site. I was sent only two. I tried to call the 800 number, no answer. I contacted support and the seller through the site. I offered to settle for a 1/3 refund or I'd wait for the seller to ship the missing item. Seller said she'd ship, she never did. Site asked me to rate seller and close case. I told them the case was not resolved. They said records showed I received my items. I explained it was only a partial shipment. The site rated the seller and closed my case. WHAT???  Be careful. My only recourse now is Paypal. DO NOT TRUST THIS SITE!!!

title: Worst Selling App on the Market. Literally
reviewText: These people are quick to ban for no reason play so many run around games to give you your money. Takes months for that. And even after it's a wrongful ban they require every drop of private personal info possible that they can get from you in order to make sure you can't ever return to their marketplace. Honest sellers can't even thrive on there to be real. Their entire marketplace is literally just spam posts of counterfeit products. Maybe 10% of all listings is actually genuine product. Also you have no way of refusing to give any of that private info without them illegally holding your funds hostage until you do. If you don't they will literally never give you your money. And if you do they still make you wait 90 days.The support on there is complete garbage. Even offerup with only having email support and very minimal responses from social media they have better support. Mercari offers no protection to the sellers only the buyers. If a buyer requests a return expect that Mercari auto accepts it within an hour even if you as a seller reach out with proof that you sent exactlywhat you claimed to send. They completely ignore you and auto accept it anyways. To sum it up. The app is garbage. The market is a Scam fest. And Mercari themselves are no help only nuisances. Highly recommend you stick to offerup, eBay or amazon. They're all cheaper in the long run trust me. This app is 100% not worth it.

title: Superb
reviewText: After reading the negative reviews from sellers on here I was super nervous but continued to do what I love to do, which is buy and resell. I had an issue where an item I had shipped said "item awaiting delivery scan" which means the post office delivery driver forgot to scan the item when delivered and it had been about two weeks of waiting and basically I couldn't receive my money let alone a rating from the buyer (plus the buyer wouldn't reply to my messages) so I had contacted the Mercari team once and received bland feedback and then contacted them a few days later and received my rating and money! I'm so appreciative that Mercari support helps out when needed.        On a side note, I also love how I can make offers to others personally or even a temporary deal for the public.

title: Sometimes unfair to sellers
reviewText: I have been on Mercari since the days when everyone kept messaging each other saying it was a scam back in 2014! I stuck it out and have been through many many many changes and I do like it for the most part BUT I have had some bad experiences too ~ one example = I sold a six piece bundle to a buyer who decided she was not happy with it and requested a return but only returned two of the 6 items and because there was no way for me to prove this to Mercari they refunded her money so, she got a full refund and kept my items (a juicy couture bangle bracelet with a charm, 2 brand new summer dresses with tags and a Lilly Pulitzer skirt) I lost a lot of money in those items and Mercari did nothing for me even though she was later banned from the app! I was bitter! and then there is the horrible awful rating system! Of all the changes this app has gone through they just can't seem to come up with some way to be fair to sellers :( it's like ratings are written in stone and can never be changed! I'm having a bad Mercari day and unfortunately it's not the first time & sadly won't be the last time !!!I also sell & buy on other apps and have for many years but I don't ever go through anything like this with them!

reviewText: I sold a mini Coach wallet for literal dirt cheap ($5) just because I wanted it gone. I tried calling Mercari's Support Line multiple times, but they are "currently busy and will have to put you on hold" FOR TEN MINUTES AND AUTOMATICALLY HANG UP ON YOU. I tried to deal with this in the help center on their app. They say that they trust buyers more than sellers and in this case they won't do anything about it. I am mad about this because I gave this person 5 Stars when they literally didn't deserve it. They got a dirt cheap AUTHENTIC Coach wallet and got to ruin my reviews because they felt like it. MERCARI DOESN'T PROTECT THEIR SELLERS!! They like to pretend they are an amazing trustworthy app, but in reality they are sketchy and terrible to sellers and buyers alike.

reviewText: I tried selling on hereto make quick money, but it wasn't quick at all. It took over a week after my sale to actually receive my payment. title: Sellers are terrible. App is great??
reviewText: So the app has worked flawless, but so far, every item we've purchased NEVER gets shipped!! There's no way to review a seller for not shipping after a deal was made. We purchase, it charges our credit card, we then wait for sellers to ship. And wait. And wait. Supposedly there's a three day shipping window, but when they don't ship, you have to ask Mercari to cancel the order. Which then gives you the reply that they'll contact the seller and give them a 24 hr notice. So you wait again. We have twice waited 5 days for shipping on two separate sellers before cancelling because they stop responding. There's no way to get Mercari to contact them until you give up and ask to cancel, which then has to be "approved", even though it has never shipped! The sellers are a joke and no way to rate them when they don't ship, so the seller still has an "excellent" profile. You should at the very least be able to say, "deal was cancelled for failure to ship". Give the incentive for them to ship promptly and give the customer an idea of what to expect from the seller. It's been a waste of 2 weeks waiting for my purchases. Don't waste your time here.  I'm going back to Craigslist and eBay

title: BUYER BEWARE- NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!
reviewText: I used to recommend this app to all of my friends and family- even coworkers on a regular basis. The listings are no longer free which does effect prices now- but that's not even my issue because you can always find a good deal anyway.. my only issue— and it is a big one, in my opinion— is that the buyer protection is a load of crap! You need to be very very careful of what u but from this app, because I'm out a good bit of money on a fake pair of jeans. I am not against a good knock off now- but I don't want to pay an authentic brand price for something that is clearly not authentic. When I requested the return, and stated how the jeans I spent a good bit of money on- were clearly not authentic. My request was denied with no explanation and the purchase was completed and I'm just out all of the money that I spent and stuck with a knock off pair of jeans that aren't even the standard length for the brand (talking like 3 and a half inches) so now, not only do I have the fake jeans- but the tag says one length and they measure way shorter- so of course they are too short for me!! Can't even wear them! I have many many pairs of authentic jeans in this brand- it's the only brand I really wear.. and these are so clearly not the same quality and have weird tags and no rivets to hold the back label on- which they are known for! Absolutely ZERO help from customer service! I have been buying from Mercari faithfully for the last 5 years.. and have never had a problem. But the minute I did have an issue- I received no help, and was left to take the loss. I will NEVER recommend this app to anyone I know again- because I'd hate to know that I directed them here, just to get screwed like I did. I'm not sure if I'll be able to order with any confidence from Mercari again. I think I'll just stick with eBay- they have a REAL buyer protection program and if an item isn't as described- customer service will be right on it! They go above and beyond to make sure buyers and sellers don't end up screwed over! They can just keep that money, it was a lesson bought I suppose— but I'll make sure that everyone I ever hear even mention this app knows how they will screw u over- so this way my bought lesson can at least save others—- NEVER AGAIN MERCARI..

title: Poor customer service
reviewText: I purchase a phone and after initial assessment it seemed fine. I went to submit a review and it asked if the IMEI matched what they had on file. It did not match so I went to contact support and inquire what I should do about that. I waited for a response and instead got a notification every 24 hours saying after 3 days of the item arriving I would have a 5 star review submitted for me so they seller could be paid. I did not want a 5 star review to be sent for me since the IMEI was incorrect. I waited till literally the last minute to finally submit a review and got a notification that said after a review is submitted the seller will be paid and my purchase would be final. I waited till the last minute because as it had been laid out to me either way my purchase would have a review submitted and the payment would be sent to the seller making my purchase final. Well 3 days and a few hours after I sent my question to support they finally got back to me saying they couldn't help me because I had submitted a review myself. I have been talking to them for over 10 days now frequently waiting at least 2 days in between responses from them trying to get this resolved and getting nowhere. At thins point I just want to know how I was supposed to know that the 5 star review that would have been sent for me would have been different. Anyway, their customer service has been significantly less than helpful through this.TLDR: If you do decide to use this app, do NOT submit a review if something is wrong. Let them give them a 5 star review for you.

title: Unrealistic feedback system
reviewText: While I love being able to find hard to locate items, the feedback system is set up in a way where it can not be trusted.  The seller does not give feedback until AFTER the buyer.  Therefore if you as a buyer are not completely satisfied with your transaction- it's impossible to leave an honest review.  So you gamble.. do I tell the truth and give anything less than a 5 in hopes I will still get an honest fair rating in return after I immediately paid and held up to my end of the sale?  Or do I leave a 5 when it wasn't earned? Lets be realistic.. Chances are you won't be left anything more (if not worse) than what you left for the seller.  This was a problem early on with E bay and it was rectified.  Though addressing it w Mecari they didn't seem concerned.

title: Improving...
reviewText: I've been with this app for years now, and they went from great to bad to okay.You used to be able to search for something, edit how you've written it, and re-search it with the same filters you'd previously applied - definitely easier than constantly applying the same filters for each search. Absolutely hate the new layout that puts your likes with your saved searches (you can't compare something in your "likes" to something you've found in a new search of saved search.) Annoying.Most recently, I've had issues with notifications - I have them on only for messages, yet I'm getting BS notifications from Mercari multiple times per day. ENOUGH!! I want to be notified for buying/selling ONLY. There is no way to shut these meaningless, annoying notifications off - "cute" little messages are not making me use this app more, it will make me delete it.I've also had issues as a buyer with fraudulent sellers - purchase item, seller never ships, cancel order, seller is never penalized and buyer is unable to rate to warn other buyers. Be cautious.This app takes minimal profit earnings, and if you follow the rules, it is easy to navigate and buy/sell from. Figure out the notification thing, Mercari. If you offer us the option to choose - honor it!

title: Lower Your Shipping Rates
reviewText: I've been selling on Mercari for nearly 2 years and Mercari started off very well but they have continually disappointed me... I remember when they first raised their shipping prices, which I thought was fair although I would have much rather preferred the lower prices. And now they have REALLY raised their shipping prices! How do you expect sellers to make any money on Mercari when you are eating away nearly half or more than half of our earnings?! I ask that Mercari seriously consider lowering their shipping prices again. Also, I do not like the new "smart" shipping prompts-they make posting products more complicated, time-consuming, and overall more difficult. Please Mercari, lower your shipping prices or I will have to consider "closing up shop"...

title: Buyer Protection Extremely Limited
reviewText: WARNING: Do not buy on Mercari if planning to use sealed item for gift purposes or you need more then 3 days to assemble and test the item.  Once you pass the 3 day mark, it doesn't matter if you are totally in the right about an issue, Mercari will not assist you and in fact will not even allow a seller to fix the problem as returns or exchanges are not allowed after the 3 day period.  In my case, we bought an item to be used as a gift and gave it to our child a few weeks after purchase.  The item looked just as it should from the outside, but unfortunately the seller had made a mistake and the item received was totally different then what had been described.  This was a good seller that had made an honest mistake, but because more then the 3 days had passed, Mercari will not allow the seller to exchange or return the item.   As I was using this item for a gift, I couldn't fully inspect the item until it was opened by the recipient.  Just read the complaints on here and you will see Mercari has the exact same response if you need few days (perhaps you are waiting for a weekend) to assemble a larger purchase.  If something is broken or missing, they will not allow a return/exchange simply because it has been more then 3 days, they don't care about the specifics of the case and will just send you a canned response.  I could understand a reasonable limit of time, like 30 days, but 3 days is way too short to allow for real buyer protection.  I bought a small item, with limited value, so it is not a big deal, but I can only imagine how badly you could get burned if you bought expensive electronics or something of that nature.  It invites seller fraud, as a seller will know that as long as the buyer doesn't get a chance to fully inspect and test the item in the short 3 day period, they cannot be held accountable to the buyer for their fraud.

title: I love the Mercari app!
reviewText: I love this app! I am an eBay seller as well. What I like about Mercari is that there are no listing fees, no seller fees, no final value fees, no shipping label fees. 10% of your sale goes to Mercari. That's it. I know 10% sounds like a lot but compared with all the added on fees eBay takes it really isn't much at all. Post your item. Item sells. Print shipping label. Drop off. Buyer gets the item. You get paid. Done! Fast. Easy. Simple.

title: Needs improvement
reviewText: I love the fact that Mercari offers an alternative to eBay and is easy to use. My issues lie within the buggy and clunky search options and Boolean term effectiveness.My biggest gripe is the fact that I can't permanently turn off the "any" option when searching for items.  Every search entered defaults to allow both things for sale and items that have sold. So if I adjust options to show only items currently for sale, then change my search slightly, it reverts back to show both sold and items for sale. Which tends to clutter the listings. Showing sold items is a great feature, and I'm fine if that's the default, but PLEASE allow me to turn it off permanently.Also, please fix whatever bug is causing the slow searches in the latest version. Every time I search, the entire drop down search history list pops up and then the search commences. Which wasn't the case in my last update. This makes new searches especially laggy.And finally, do some work on your search algorithm. I get a lot of unrelated items when I do any search.

But Mercari replied that they needed his friends information even if he wasn't going to send him funds. His friend will not provide that private info. My husband just wants to send his funds to his own account and Mercari has suspended his account even though he has provided all his private information. At this point it seems like Mercari just wants to find a way to keep all his funds. They are refusing to let him access his funds even though they have verified his identity. title: You have to be willing to search and be patient
reviewText: I have truly enjoyed using the Mercari app!  I accidentally stumbled on to it one night will googling for a particular product. A Mercari ad popped up with the specific item I was searching for. I downloaded the app and began learning how to navigate through Mercari. I said in the title, you have to be willing to search and be patient. My first few purchases were quick, knee jerk reactions, because I thought the item was going to be bought up before I could. I've learned, wait and be patient... don't go for the very first one you see. Keep looking, read reviews, read descriptions carefully. And remember, the person on the other end of the transaction is a human just like you are!!  Be kind!!!

title: Customer service is terrible.
reviewText: Mercari offers promotions periodically and offer a referral bonus, but don't bother. You won't get credit for any of it. Customer service is mostly just form messages. Also, be super careful because there are active scammers. Make sure you take screenshots of everything and weigh your packages. I'm going back to selling on EBay. title: Terrible customer service
reviewText: The worst. We are professional resellers and this app is ok but the backend is a mess. Tons of glitches and what makes it worse is the HORRIBLE customer service. 12+ hours just to get a boiler plate response on a order I placed that was shipped incomplete? And then when they finally respond it's a generic response completely ignoring everything I said. I've been using the platform for over a year and this has never changed. You can't run a sales business and then not give the proper customer service... or any at all for that matter. I won't be using this platform anymore. If this is what our customers have to deal with if there's a shipping issue with their order then screw this. Oh and it's January 15th and they are still giving people the "we are busy because of the holidays so response time is longer..." no it's not the holidays Mercari

title: Great, Fair Selling App
reviewText: I really enjoy selling on Mercari, it is a very simple and fast process. This platform is much more fair-minded, treating buyers and sellers equally, which is a nice departure from the big e's rough treatment and bad attitude toward sellers. The flat 10% commission is also very reasonable. One thing that would help smooth it out would be to add a feature so the seller can search their listings to quickly find an item that needs editing instead of having to scroll through dozens/hundreds of items to find the one that needs work. Keep up the great work!

title: Professional Scammers!! BE AWARE!!
reviewText: They held exactly $3105.30 of my hard earned money as a hostage against me and they requested my SSN in-exchange for my funds! No further explanation was presented. Of course, I refused to give sensitive information to a private company for no reason, so I presented them with four different forms of identification. They closed my account and replied to my email saying and I quote "If you're not willing to provide the information requested then there is nothing else to discuss and you remaining funds will be escheated to the Unclaimed Property Department of Pennsylvania." Note: 1-Their contact number is almost non-existent! They answer after a week and end up telling you we can only discuss this through email! 2-All of their emails are sent by Zendesk, which is a third party customer service. Makes sense yet?I'm a professional seller and I have other seller accounts with every E-com business out here. I have never had anything like this happen to me before. Companies that collect such private information usually ask for that prior to opening your seller account. I trust that. However, When a company puts a hold on your funds that you've been collecting for months and pushes you against the wall to get some private information, I don't. AVOID THIS APP AT ALL COSTS!

title: Best app out now
reviewText: Now I'm comfortable about reviewing. I'm not the type to review anything fast , half of me didn't want to review yet cause I still feel it's early but I think I'm ok, because customer service is very prompt and professional. Before using I read a lot reviews and I watched multiple YouTube videos bad n good .I seen a lot more good then bad so I gave it a try .I swear no lie second day BOOM! sale . When I seen that it did something to me and I haven't looked back since lol mind you it's only been A month and two weeks now but I have made a sale almost ever two days . So as far as the bad side , I don't like that they don't research before they give you a final warning for counterfeit because like I stated I researched so I know the rules and they warned me about a item that was authentic. But like I said it was handled prompt and professional. I wish they would also let you move your pictures around in your market the one that have been posted for days instead of deactivating it and writing and pasting it all over again. If anyone plans to use just make sure you learn the lbs vs oz  in packaging if you sell w option free shipping Remember it's coming out your pocket so weigh wisely. T-shirt's are not 1lb but the option will suggested and it will show you a shirt so just make sure you pick wisely and know if it's not a sweater it does not weigh no 1lb-3lbs. But Overall this app is a side job, motivation , inspiration for business owners or just anyone that's wants to get rid of all the junk in they're homes. I will be telling people about this app. Also be prepared to fill out tax papers as well because you know the government can't let us have nothing smh . Oct 19 Starts tax information input to mercari will start. Either way go have fun best app out now !!

title: Ridiculous
reviewText: After using EBay and purchasing an item and having it cancelled, I then had to wait for a refund. Thinking Mercari would be better I searched for a few days on it until I found what I wanted. I then added a debit card and then purchased the item. 5 minutes later I learned that I was suspended for ‘unusual activity' AND my order was cancelled AND ( like EBay ) I was charged for the purchase and was told I had to wait 5-10 days for a refund. I don't recommend this for anyone purchasing online.

title: This app does not care about its sellers
reviewText: Anyone looking to find an alternative to selling on eBay should hard pass on Mercari. As a seller, you're unable to access any of your funds until your item has shipped out, and been rated. Shipping can take anywhere from 3-5 days, or longer, and the customer has 3 days to rate the transaction after that, until money gets deposited into your Mercari account. From there, you have the choice to either use your money to purchase product within the app, or transfer to a bank, which takes anywhere from 3-4 days. I've had a decent amount of sales and none of my funds from these sales were accessible until at least 8-9 days. Another issue, is that Mercari will always, no matter what, stand by its buyers before sellers, leaving a very open hole for scamming and abuse.If you're an online seller, or just looking to sell some things before the holidays, try a different platform. Mercari wont be around long with the terrible system they have in place. And I won't get started on how awful their customer service is.

title: Absolutely disgusted and disappointed. -100 stars if I could.
reviewText: PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS APP. I have been scammed and the seller nor the app have been helpful whatsoever. Below is my review of the particular seller I went through. "I received my laptop, it was not disclosed to me that the charging port on the computer was messed up so that it only charges when you plug it in a specific way. My husband and I have only been able to plug it up to charge 2 times in the 2.5 days I've had it. The seller nor the app were helpful at all. The seller told me to use someone else's charger, but it wasn't the charger! It was the port on the computer itself. She was no help whatsoever and didn't even try to help me until I told her I was reporting her to the app. Which brings me to my next complaint! This app is such BS. It claims they have a 3 day return guarantee, but do not offer a way to file for a return. It is such a huge scam I can't even begin to tell you how angry I am at this whole situation. I've emailed customer support through Mercari, and I have not heard a single thing. Even if I do, it will be AFTER the 3 day return point and is irrelevant. -100 stars if I could"I am just so utterly disappointed that an app with such good ratings has let me down like this. I will NEVER use this app again and when anyone asks about it, I will tell them til my face is blue how much of a crock of crap this app is! They say there is a return guarantee, but when I went to file for a return, all it kept giving me was the runaround with articles and FAQs. I sent the email to customer support and have never heard anything back. I only rated the seller because I knew I wouldn't ever be helped with returning, so I wanted anyone in the future to be able to see what my issues had been. I am in serious disbelief of all of this, I even took the laptop I ordered to 2 certified tech places (one being Apple) and they said it should've never been sold to me in that condition - so do with that information what you will.

title: Bargaingalbst
reviewText: Really loved the app to begin as it's very easy to list and to communicate with buyers. But, some updates have made it harder not easier to use. The sell one like this button was great but now it's gone and to re-list an item takes to long.  They should have left it on the app. The color option and title auto fill with wrong info all the time.  If you delete an item it bumps you back to your first listing so you have to scroll through everything again to pick up where the item you deleted was (when I first started if you deleted item you were still in place). All these things are time wasters for sellers. It was much easier before these things came about. I still love the app I just wish they would fix the things that add so much time for sellers.

Bad practice, none of the stuff is verified and it's basically a bunch of people selling shady and possibly junk crap to others. title: ONE thing you must read before downloading!
reviewText: Hey you.I want to help you not get burned like I did.I was formerly a person who used eBay and started using Mercari.  I thought I was having decent experiences;  until I realized that I had a bad review from a seller.  Why?  I had forgotten to rate them immediately (you only get a couple of days).No other issues.  No ill will or communications.  I just forgot to rate the seller.In addition, sellers can easily seek retribution if you were to leave a factual and less than perfect review...because they get the last word!  In fact, this over-inflates seller reviews by disincentivizing honest reviews that are not positive Will be deleting my Mecari account and looking for alternatives and I suggest you do the same!

title: Great Selling App
reviewText: Mercari is a great app overall there are very good things about it but it has it's flaws. Everything is great about the app accept you should be able to cancel an item you ordered within 24 hours of purchasing the item or before they notify you the item has shipped. You shouldn't make it so the seller has to accept the cancellation because if someone decided they didn't want something and the seller doesn't accept that they want to cancel the item before they have shipped it then that isn't fair. If someones wants to cancel an item before it was shipped then they should be able to. All and all besides that its a great selling app and i would recommend using it if you don't mind the cancellation issue.

title: Terrible Buyer Protection
reviewText: I have been using Mercari for awhile, and had no issues. However, recently I purchased an expensive item and there was an issue with delivery and tracking, and my item was lost. The Mercari customer service was slow in terms of response time and pretty careless. Even though they knew my package never got to me as I had emailed customer service, they released my payment anyways. Mercari claims that buyers are protected from situations like this on all of their FAQ and help pages. I had to email them 3 times, and their resolution was to give me a Mercari credit. Something I could only use on the app - not an actual refund, and it expires in 30 days. Poshmark has way better customer service and buyer protection. Be aware before you purchase an expensive item that you may lose all your money. I'm sticking to Poshmark from now on.

title: Horrible customer service. Try poshmark!
reviewText: I rarely write reviews, but felt compelled to as I have had some of the worst customer service experiences with this app. I've received items that are not as described and had returns denied for no clear reason. Aside from that, on other instances they didn't even respond to my actual questions, but rather copy/pasted their FAQs. I've never had customer service that takes forever to respond, and then doesn't even answer your questions. I've been using the selling app poshmark for a little over a year now and haven't had any of these problems, and their customer service gets back to you usually within hours. If you do decide to use mercari, just know that every purchase is a risk- you may not receive what you ordered, and customer service is definitely not helpful. Stay away!

title: An Amazing selling/buying app!
reviewText: This App is superb!! It's a great platform not only to sell but to buy! When buying your payment is held by mercari for up to 3 days after delivery allowing u time to verify the product works and came as listed and pictured. If any problems u can get a refund and return item. And if you sell and you don't get a review in 3 days and if the customer hasn't requested a return/refund you won't get left on the hook with them not rating bc mercari will rate you and release the funds!! I love this app for selling items and I've bought quite a few items and haven't had any problems but when I reached out to customer service about something I was greeted with a fast response back. And when using his app it's easy for seller & buyer to communicate. I highly recommend mercari to anyone who wants to sell and/or buy items. This is better then Ebay in my opinion.

reviewText: I purchased a fake and was reimbursed, so I'm overall happy with the app, but their process is a bit flawed. It's just safer to pay full price from the store and know it's authentic.

title: Decent. Needs Work
reviewText: UPDATE 2: Also, I keep getting notifications on things I've looked at without liking. I don't know if it's a bug, but if it is, please fix it as it's very irritating to constantly see the updates on things I'm not interested in.UPDATE: Auto-like whenever you message someone is EXTREMELY annoying. Especially when you're simply questioning them about an item or unliking and letting them know. PLEASE REMOVE.POSITIVES:+ Lowballing offers are limited! (25% off max when making an offer. People of course can still ask.)+ Listing can be saved as drafts if you can't finish all at once. Multiple drafts allowed+ Free to promote items (5% price drop for public and 10% for likers) + Good search filters (Good amount of categories, brand, size, condition, status, price, color)NEGATIVES: - Needs a way to organize likes like normal search categories - Needs a way for sellers to reach out to likers through liked items or general message.- Unable to send pictures in chats (necessary for broken or deformed items)- Needs to have a reported reason when someone is blocked (I was blocked once by a potential buyer with no warning or given reason after I checked in with her on the day she said she would pay.)Has gotten much better than before, but still has some issues I'd like fixed.

title: Best selling app I’ve ever used
reviewText: i've been through the wringer with ebay, and etsy, and poshmark, and this is hands-down the best platform i've used. everywhere else i had minimal sales, and especially when you're paying to list stuff, that doesn't feel great. what stood out to me from the beginning was the fact that i didn't have to pay to list. it prompted me to list more because there was no loss other than the time it took to make a listing if something didn't sell. and man, have i sold more items than i ever would have thought possible. yeah, there's stuff that doesn't sell, but i feel like i have a much better chance here than anywhere else. some of my items have sold in literal minutes of listing. i never write reviews for anything, but after listing something on a whim today and selling it (once again) before the end of the day, i have to commend you all for such an outstanding app. features are great, design is cohesive, listing is easy, and the customer base is there. love it! never change!!

reviewText: I purchased an item for 55 dollars but was sent the wrong thing. I contact customer support and they claimed to have sent me a shipping label via email. title: Don’t Sell Large Items
reviewText: I have had some success selling small items with Mercari.  Unfortunately, they advertise that they offer a Pack and Go shipping option through the UPS Store for $120 that the UPS Store does not actually recognize.  The UPS Store near us told us they do not have the boxes or shipping material for large items (in this case, a  40 inch TV).  They called other stores in the area and none would take our item.  Mercari has refused to step in to help or correct their false advertising.  I don't recommend trying to sell large items on this app - it will leave you and your buyer frustrated as you attempt to get your money back.

title: Buyers hold up payment by not rating promptly!
reviewText: While I like the App for the most part and have some success buying and selling, I think they need to rethink the rating system.  3 days is a long time after the item is delivered for buyer to rate.  And many times I have buyers who don't rate and I have to wait shipping time and then the 3 Days after delivery.  I think it's actually somewhat rude.  As sellers we are held accountable for shipping quickly and buyers should be held accountable to rate promptly.  Maybe they should be rated by how quickly they rate people.  I guess I should be rating by how quickly they rate me.  After 3 Days they are getting the poor rating, maybe that will prompt buyers to start rating faster.  If I was was a slow shipper I would expect the same, that's why I always ship the next business day.

title: SELLER BEWARE
reviewText: I had a lot of luck I guess you can call it now with selling on Mercari. Until now. I sold a Samsung galaxy phone that once the buyer received within an hour requested a refund. Fine, if you want a refund then I will oblige. But Mercari, has had the return under review for a week and half now. I do not get paid, and the buyer still has my phone. How will the phone be returned in the same condition I sent it when it's been in their possession for almost two weeks? I have contacted support over ten times they just keep saying they need to review it. I lost a phone and over $300. Please be wary of selling expensive items on this app.

title: Scammers and NO Seller Support
reviewText: This app does have many users and you can sell on there if your prices are fair. However, I must warn of the app's policy & customer service allows for scamming sellers & defamatory libel from buyers. One buyer reached out to me wanting to keep item but demanding refund!?!I said I would do a return but would not refund without my item back, duh. She insisted, cursed, threatened, lied and made up excuses to try to explain why she wanted both ends of our deal... including she threw in dumpster! Since I refused to let her keep both, she started a return claim, then she cancelled it within a few hours & rated me. I cannot see her review until I review her, but I have a pretty good idea of the content, and she had to lie about me considering the situation. I asked for help from customer service, they were on my side and seemed outraged at the buyer's behavior like I was, but were no help to me, in fact were more than unhelpful and even hurtful. After talking with a few reps, the last guy told me that I had to accept her defamatory libel statement on my page, & HAD TO rate within 24h or they will automatically rate her "for me". However if you don't reach out to support you can go months without rating your buyers without problems. I feel like support was actually bullying me to just accept that her libel will be next to my name, address and picture, where all of my social media friends can see lies printed about me only because it is easier for support than to go remove bad reviews. I responded to that rep and asked why slander (oral or spoken lies) was against policy on a written app, yet libelous (written slander) act were not. But it takes about 24h for a response and over 12h already passed so I will have no choice but to rate and try to get my side of the story (the truth) accross.

title: Way better than eBay from buyer and seller side.
reviewText: Mercarí is a lot easier to use than eBay. Since I've discovered my car I have a mess up on here almost every day looking for new bargains. They only charge you 10% if you list something and that's only after it sells. They don't charge a fee to post items. When you buy something and it was not as described, you don't have any fears of being cheated because you can simply request to return it. They don't get payment until after it's approved by you, the buyer. I'm enjoying it and have recommended it to others.  I've had one bad experience so far though. I made an offer to a seller for less than her asking price. She declined. I bought it at her asking price. She later canceled the transaction and sent me a nasty message telling me how terrible I was for making her an offer even though the "make offer" button is right there under the listing. She blocked me before I could even respond so I couldn't rate her stating she doesn't want to do business with people like me. I didn't realize trying to buy her item made me a bad person. Customer service did nothing when I asked how I could rate her as a seller. I think I should've been allowed to rate her.

title: I didn’t get paid
reviewText: So I just download this app because my friend was telling me I should try it out and sell some things I don't use anymore so I thought why not right. Well I put my shoes up for sale and I got someone to buy them, I packaged the item and shipped it out via fedex. A few days pass and I still don't see a rating or any payment so I started to get a little concerned, the shipping says it delivered but I still haven't gotten payment. So I wait maybe one or two more days I check again and it says it's not delivered now all of a sudden. So I thought well that was weird. I checked the buyers profile and there are my shoes back up for sale yet I STILL HAVENT GOT ANY PAYMENT AT ALL. The buyer managed to accept my item but still no payment . How can this be possible? Buyers are protected but not the sellers? I will not be using this app again.

title: I got Scam for $2,300! Do not sell on this app!
reviewText: I am a seller by the name Vangbac on this app. I believe that I am being scam by this company. They don't release my funds for products that I sold, shipped, and already received by buyers! 5 days ago, I created a seller account to sell my LEGO Disney Castles item# 71040. These I bought inside the LEGO Stores in Maryland back in 2016. These were meant to be hold on to because everybody knows that LEGO were collectible until recently when LEGO company decided to remake all their old, retired sets! Therefore, there's no point in holding onto these sets for resell 5 or 10 years from now. I decided to resell these to get back some of my money and cut some losses.I sold a total of 7 sets within 4 days and shipped out all 7 to my buyers. 3 buyers already received their purchase and were really happy. They wrote great reviews and gave me 5 stars. With each sets I sent out to my buyers, I also included a copy of my purchased receipt to prove their authenticity so the buyers can sleep good. These were sold from $310-$330. Yes, not cheap at all. I made a total of $2,300+. However, I only received $804 so far and $1,450 still processing. I tried to withdraw my funds, Mercari support contacted me and ask to verified my identity in which I'm happy to comply. I gave my Driver License picture ID, my social security number, my bank account information, my Facebook verified, my proof of home address. Everything! They said that they're still not satisfied and that I must wait for their specialist agent to contact me to resolve this verification! It's been almost 48 hours....no one contact me. I tried to contact them, still nothing. Now, $2,300 is in their account and I already sent out all my sold items via UPS to my buyers, but I cannot withdraw my funds. Please, please think twice before you start selling on this App! Stick with eBay or Amazon since their American companies. This Mercari is not an American company and this seems to me like a scam! What would you do in my situation?! Please help spread the words so we, American don't get scam from these foreign companies!

title: SCAMMERS ALLOWED ON THIS APP— MERCARI DOES NOTHING
reviewText: I have used mercari for many years. I came upon a listing, where a lady was lying about her product and had duped other users (I was contacted by buyers that had purchased from her). I reported the listing and nothing was done. So I made a listing warning people about the scammer. I tried reporting her and still mercari did nothing. After a month, I finally decided to ask them why they have yet to do anything about posting and I get a reply to go to the listing and report it. REALLY? If that would of worked, I wouldn't of inquired about it. Instead, they use their time to warn me about my conduct because of the warning listing I posted. SERIOUSLY?!? Since then she has posted more ads on her account selling the fraudulent items. So beware when using this app because you what you think you're buying, might not be what you actually get! Thanks mercari, you really care about your users!

title: NO BUYER PROTECTION
reviewText: I made a purchase through this app and even though it said it was delivered I never received the product. Figuring since it was Merchari handling the shipping they would simply open a claim on their end and I would get my refund but every time I emailed them they essentially said to call my local police.... and then issued me store credit. Well there's not another product available and there's nothing else I want to buy but even so they just say sorry but they can't do anything. So now I'm out the money and have no product

title: Great app but lacks essential browsing filters
reviewText: This is a great app for selling and buying! Some great improvements have been made in the past year that make to selling and shopping experience easier and user friendly. I will give the app 5 stars, once they add filters to individual sellers listings. When a potential buyers find an item they like, they usually want to see what else does the seller have listed that they might be interested in. The problem is that you can't filter their listings and when sellers have hundreds of items listed, it discourages the buyers from looking and the seller can miss out on potential multiple purchases. So please add filters other than "sold".

title: My favorite selling app
reviewText: Mercari is by far my favorite platform for selling. I use poshmark, eBay, Vinted, etsy and depop, too, but Mercari is the one with consistent sales for me with clothes, shoes and household items. Perks: 10% selling fee. Good customer service. It's easy to list from my phone and now I can show up to 12 photos of each item. There's NO listing fee, which can make a difference when choosing which platform to place an item. Buyers generally get a better price on Mercari than other sites, too, because sellers mark up items to cover fees. That's just business. Suggested for future versions: 1) Video! A short video, in addition to 12 photos, could help show that an item works or what it looks like in motion. Or even limitations or defects. 2) Digital downloads: lots of sellers offer digital products for immediate download. Etsy sellers pay .20 per listing, per download, every 120 days. That .20 adds up! A lot of Etsy sellers would happily migrate over to Mercari to give it a try. That would require different fees, though. Mercari would have to allow for $1 to $4 digital sales. Something to think about for future versions, perhaps. 3) Shipping changes: shipping is high everywhere. I'm not picking on Mercari. However, if they could offer shipping in a few more weight categories....right now a pair of jeans in the 1 - 3 pounds category is $11 by USPS. I suggest a 1 - 2 pound category at $7 or $8 in addition to a 2.01 - 3 pound category at $11. Poshmark offers flat rate shipping of around $7 for up to 5 pounds. But they also collect sales tax. This probably isn't far off for every platform, though, so enjoy the tax free status on Mercari while you can. When I'm buying, I check Mercari for free shipping first, then poshmark for the $7 shipping. And now that poshmark is allowing the sale of home goods and collectibles this is a big deal as a buyer and a seller.

title: Good so far, but...
reviewText: I have only been using this app for a few days now, but have already been through the process of selling and shipping an item.For the most part I think the app is very convenient and easy to use.My only issue with it is the shipping cost. I didn't realize till after printing out my first label it is First Class Shipping. I wish there were more options to chose from such as standard shipping.Now I realize why some used items have had a higher price. It's hard to get the money you want for an item with all the cost deductions; but at the same time if you raise the cost, no one will buy it.I understand Mercari has to make a profit, but coming from a seller there is no point in using the app if you will only earn $5.
